name: Tipsy Stickman - Endless Runner Game
description:
Tipsy Stickman is an addicting one-touch endless running game. Jump to land on tipping platforms and over red spikes. Download RIGHT NOW and see how good your jumping skills are.

Features:

> One-Touch game play
> Tap to make character jump
> Time your jumps just right to avoid falling
> Avoid hitting a red spike
> Avoid falling into the void
> Beat your friends
